brief_summary.textblock:
(A retrospective  case control study to validate the association between Interleukin-1 gene
      variations and adult chronic periodontal disease in European Caucasians)

clinical_study.brief_title: Genetics of Periodontal Diseases in European Caucasians

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Ethnicity: Dutch or German Caucasian

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  None (however, diabetics were excluded during original patient recruitment at several
             clinical sites).

study_pop.textblock:
All study subjects will be selected from pre-existing patient databases in Germany and the
        Netherlands. All chronic periodontitis cases and controls will be subjects who were at
        least 35 years old at time of enrollment. Classification of chronic periodontitis will be
        based on extent of alveolar bone loss with consideration of tooth loss.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Retrospective
